Safe Harbour Youth is committed to empow: Safe Harbour Youth is committed to empowering youth and preventing violence. Join us in creating a safer future for all.
File a complaint if you have experienced: File a complaint if you have experienced or witnessed any form of violence. Your feedback helps us improve our services and support for those in need.
Explore the various activities and event: Explore the various activities and events we have organized to raise awareness and support for victims of violence. Join us in making a difference.
Your donation helps us continue our miss: Your donation helps us continue our mission to support victims of violence and create a safer community for everyone. Every contribution makes a difference.
About Us Text: Safe Harbour Youth is committed to empowering youth and preventing violence. Our platform connects youth with local networks and non-governmental organizations.
Our Mission Text: Empowering youth to report and receive immediate support, creating and maintaining a safe and accessible platform is our mission.
Our Vision Text: We envision a world where every young person lives without fear and violence, and our efforts are focused on creating policies and practices that protect the most vulnerable in our communities.
Core Values Text: Our core values – compassion, integrity, innovation, and commitment – drive our work. We embrace diversity, cherish confidentiality, seek the best solutions, and advocate for a proactive approach to creating a safer future for young people.
